{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Ophidian fire ball | class = SnakeProjB | game = Heretic | spawnid = 139 | spawnname = T_SNAKEPROJECTILEBIG }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SnakeProjA|SnakeProjA]]→SnakeProjB
The last and most powerful projectile thrown by an [[Classes:Snake|ophidian]]'s attack, after a volley of three [[Classes:SnakeProjA|less dangerous ones]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SnakeProjB : {{Class|SnakeProjA}} { {{Property|Damage}} 3 +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} -{{Flag|WINDTHRUST}} States { Spawn: SNFX JK 6 Bright Loop Death: SNFX LM 5 Bright SNFX N 4 Bright SNFX O 3 Bright Stop } }
